Description: Green glazed composition daily life shabti of Panehesy with painted detail: a black curled lappet-wig, a modelled face with black features, a garment with elbow-length sleeves and a triangular apron, the arms hang down the sides, the front and back of the figure are inscribed with columns of black painted Hieroglyphs within borders, the delineated feet with marked toes rest on a short plinth.
